amendatorysection.catchline: Suicide mortality review team; Department of Veterans' Affairs; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The suicide mortality review team is established in the Department of Veterans' Affairs.
(a) Department means the Department of Veterans' Affairs;
(b) Director means the Director of the Department of Veterans' Affairs or the director's designee; and
(c) Review team means the suicide mortality review team established in subsection (1) of this section.
